titles.title: Special Operations Oversight and Transparency Act
Special Operations Oversight and Transparency Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to report to Congress on the processes that the Department of Defense uses to assess, monitor, and evaluate certain special operations programs and activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Special Operations Oversight and Transparency Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to submit a report on the processes that it uses to assess, monitor, and evaluate programs and activities related to the support of special operations to combat terrorism.
